snippet.title: Little Tomato: Age of Tomatoes
snippet.description:
Test your reflexes and your ability to react in Little Tomato, a funny, frantic and addictive game in which friendly but annoying tomatoes have come to life and they are continuously jumping without stopping. To win you have to squash them quickly, but be vigilant as not all the characters are as innocent as they seem.

Follow Little Tomato through 12 different worlds with brilliant graphics that will challenge the most skilled players, reach the last level, get the highest score and put an end to this wild journey.

12 themed worlds
72 levels
Amazing graphics
Original soundtrack
Funny characters
Free

Let us know what you think.
You can follow us on Google+ at: https://plus.google.com/u/0/105943244468711269132
on Facebook at: https://www.facebook.com/LittleTomatoAgeOfTomatoes
on Twitter at: http://twitter.com/pitagames

Thanks for playing
